body_html:
ah I think i got it! try to look into it later

On Fri, Aug 23, 2013 at 1:09 PM, Sven Fuchs notifications@github.comwrote:

Hmm, no, it needs to be fixed where mailing jobs are enqueued. Currently,
when you add an address to CC for a mailing, it will enqueue a mailing job
for each address, including CC and BCC. So whoever get's CC'ed gets one
copy per recipient.

—
Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHubhttps://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/issues/46#issuecomment-23157162
.
